attributes.action: reject green belt for building residential or commercial purposes in any part of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people in many towns are disillusioned with the current 'eco-town' policy introduced by HM Govt. & the prime minister. The Housing Minister has said that she would "not build on green belt", however more & more green belt is being considered for green belt "eco-towns" instead of brown field sites. Sign up to protect our green belt and build on brown field sites.
